title: FS N300 Mayo Brothers HOF SOLD
author: bigfanNY

posts.post_title: FS N300 Mayo Brothers HOF SOLD
posts.post_content: For Sale N300 Mayo Brothers that someone long ago decided to adjust the team name on his uniform. But I am sure there are plenty of folks that would love to give this card a fine home. First PM to say I will take it for SOLD is the owner. Thank you for looking  Jonathan SOLD Thanks for your interest

Just want to put a good word in for Jonathan. I bought a Rotograph postcard from him this past summer when he first came on the board. The transaction entailed sending a fair sum of money to someone I didn't know so I kept my fingers crossed that the deal would be done in good faith. Jonathan stayed in steady communication and got the card to me in a couple of days. I have subsequently learned that he has hobby chops going back almost to the Ice Age. He's a good guy.
Mayo Hall of Famer for $220 hope it finds a good home..
